channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fallen Roof, 8th January
item.description:
There was a large crash, building at the corner of the road large pieces of wood has fallen off the roof, looks like parts of roof has fallen off property, was building works done has fallen into road and footway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lennard Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Huge amounts of dog mess across street, 8th January
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th January
item.description:
I caught this guy fly tipping, he put builders and household rubbish on the street. I approached him and he couldn’t understand me until I said I would report him. I would happily point the guy out in a line up. This part of the street has become a target since the building works started on the house on Brewery Road, including mess from the building works.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Majendie Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
